entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kirkland Lake

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle or showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
